query:
-- Get Charms category ID
SELECT id FROM category WHERE name = 'Charms';

-- Insert Pink Green Chalcedony Flower Charm
INSERT INTO product (name, slug, description, price, category_id, images, materials, stock, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  'Pink Green Chalcedony Flower Charm',
  'pink-green-chalcedony-flower-charm',
  'Enchanting water bottle charm featuring smooth marrow chalcedony natural stone beads in soft pink and green hues, accented with golden foil flower transparent resin beads and a delicate purple flower petal charm. Perfect for adding a touch of nature-inspired elegance to your water bottle.',
  10.00,
  (SELECT id FROM category WHERE name = 'Charms' LIMIT 1),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/DNnkzjhOfzsNovGM.png', 'alt', 'Pink Green Chalcedony Flower Charm - Product View'),
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/GgtMwDNcEmKpWfbk.png', 'alt', 'Pink Green Chalcedony Flower Charm - Lifestyle View'),
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/ibqhJVuhsxfwsrnj.png', 'alt', 'Pink Green Chalcedony Flower Charm - Size Reference')
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY('Smooth Marrow Chalcedony Natural Stone (12mm beads)', 'Golden Foil Flower Transparent Resin Beads (16mm)', 'Purple Flower Petal Charm (15mm)', 'Gold-tone Clasp', 'Gold-tone Hardware'),
  50,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- Insert White Pearl Bee Charm
INSERT INTO product (name, slug, description, price, category_id, images, materials, stock, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES (
  'White Pearl Bee Charm',
  'white-pearl-bee-charm',
  'Classic and elegant water bottle charm featuring lustrous white pearl beads paired with a charming gold-tone rhinestone bee pendant. The perfect accessory to add a touch of sophistication and whimsy to your daily hydration routine.',
  10.00,
  (SELECT id FROM category WHERE name = 'Charms' LIMIT 1),
  JSON_ARRAY(
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/utvEDTDZEMGQwSgj.png', 'alt', 'White Pearl Bee Charm - Product View'),
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/OjIdVRxoIWeaTvZN.png', 'alt', 'White Pearl Bee Charm - Lifestyle View'),
    JSON_OBJECT('url', 'https://files.manuscdn.com/user_upload_by_module/session_file/310519663273273644/xFHQzpbSYgOLzakF.png', 'alt', 'White Pearl Bee Charm - Size Reference')
  ),
  JSON_ARRAY('White Pearl Beads (10mm)', 'Gold-tone Rhinestone Bee Pendant', 'Gold-tone Clasp', 'Gold-tone Hardware'),
  50,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);
